text:
Direct 🍎 action 🥦 gets 🍇 the goods! 🍒🛒

Congratulations to Stop & Shop workers, who along w/ teachers + many other workers over the past year successfully protected their salary & working conditions from cuts through collective action. https://twitter.com/means_tv/status/1122902062658981888 QT @means_tv Striking gets the goods.
  ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
After 11 days, Stop & Shop workers forced management to meet their demands.
  ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Means TV was there to cover it #stopandshopstrike http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1122900931853672449/pu/img/1joSzrD14a8QbHYM.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1122900931853672449/pu/vid/320x180/0-DnLs4hOQ1GbUCq.mp4?tag=9

Climate change is here and it's hurting people of color and working class people first and worst. https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1127692297301307392 QT @BernieSanders Climate change is not just an environmental issue. It is a racial justice issue. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1127687502364643330/img/gJHIzOSGi5WSXTtr.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1127687502364643330/vid/320x320/S4ipqpyATx_MT2wb.mp4?tag=12

My mother, Shyamala, was a force of nature. She had such spirit and tenacity and I’m thankful to have been raised by her. I wish she were with us today. 

Happy #MothersDay to all the mothers, step-mothers, and mother figures out there. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1127618934507753480/pu/img/cTdjT9mW5eIL15j8.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1127618934507753480/pu/vid/320x180/zYj-OwA5zTuJgUiS.mp4?tag=9

RT @sfpelosi Happy Mothers Day! 

After Bella tasted “my” chocolates, I read her this note I wrote about her Mimi and asked her for my mom’s annual request to 5 Pelosi kids: “good behavior” 

“I would but that’s Mimi’s tradition. Don’t be a copycat, mom!” 😳🎤 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6YRStWU0AAzfT-.jpg

This is a technique of the GOP, to take dry humor + sarcasm literally and “fact check” it.

Like the “world ending in 12 years” thing, you’d have to have the social intelligence of a sea sponge to think it’s literal.

But the GOP is basically Dwight from The Office so who knows. https://twitter.com/maxkennerly/status/1127600111952044032 QT @MaxKennerly I've seen criticism of "like 10 people." The ten richest Americans are worth $730 billion. The fourteen richest American families (excluding the Koch brothers, so no double-counting) are worth $511 billion. Together, they're worth more than 60% of Americans combined. https://twitter.com/AOC/status/1127270688925134849
Wishing a very happy #MothersDay to you all! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6YcNtaW4AEsW-P.jpg

I am so honored to deliver the commencement address at @SNHU this morning. Congratulations to the Class of 2019—you can watch the livestream here: https://www.snhu.edu/student-experience/graduation/commencement-2019

RT @tianran The @Guardian editorial board comes out for a Green New Deal, saying we need it now  https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2019/may/12/the-guardian-view-on-a-green-new-deal-we-need-it-now?CMP=share_btn_tw >> @AOC @StephanieKelton @ptcherneva

This week, the House is expected to vote on the #EqualityAct to include sexual orientation & gender identity as protected classes under the Civil Rights Act. It's long past time we codified these protections. I'm proud to support this bill in the Senate - we have to get it done.

Black moms are dying from childbirth-related causes at rates 3-4 times higher than white moms—and structural racism is the root cause of this problem. We need to call it out, and then fight back. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/07/health/pregnancy-deaths-.html

Climate change is not just an environmental issue. It is a racial justice issue. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1127687502364643330/img/gJHIzOSGi5WSXTtr.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1127687502364643330/vid/320x320/S4ipqpyATx_MT2wb.mp4?tag=12

This is an issue of basic survival. We will not continue to allow drug companies to make massive profits while diabetics ration lifesaving insulin because they can't afford it. We will bring down prescription drug costs by 50%. https://twitter.com/RoKhanna/status/1127601576078536704 QT @RoKhanna Average insulin costs have almost doubled in four years. Costs keep rising because the three main suppliers abuse the patent system to prevent a generic version from entering the market.

We must rein in Big Pharma greed to save lives. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6X8l-xXoAAfuiG.png

Abortion is health care. Maternal care is health care. And women should make their own health care decisions. 
https://www.marieclaire.com/politics/a27409131/male-presidential-candidates-2020-reproductive-rights/

This Mother's Day, I'm thinking about all the mothers who should be with their children but are instead separated from them bc of the Trump administration's family separation policy. They'll never be able to recover this time lost together - we must fight until they're reunited.

Making certain that future generations have a planet that is healthy and habitable is a moral imperative. With their activism, young people are taking the lead in the fight against climate change. I look forward to speaking to the @sunrisemvmt tomorrow.

On #MothersDay, I’m thinking about Black and Brown moms in our country. Women of color are dying from pregnancy and childbirth-related causes at staggering rates and it is the direct result of institutional and structural racism. We need to call it out and address it head on. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D48s71NWAAAXGZg.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1121163418797580290/vid/320x320/DW7_4-dMM9D2Zzek.mp4?tag=11

Thanks, mom!
https://www.reviewjournal.com/news/politics-and-government/cory-booker-has-a-lock-on-one-las-vegas-vote-his-moms-1661061/

Earlier today I joined @GStephanopoulos on @ThisWeekABC to discuss ending the ongoing congressional partisan investigations, the hypocrisy of some democrats and what is going to happen with the escalating trade wars. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iuI2NLacDtc&feature=youtu.be

Time to end the partisan investigation which has consumed us for the last two years. @realDonaldTrump was cleared by the Mueller report, time to move on! https://twitter.com/thisweekabc/status/1127569397709586432 QT @ThisWeekABC Sen. Rand Paul on Mueller probe: "I think since the very beginning this all has been politically motivated. Now both sides are doing it. I think it goes back even to the Clintons. This is why we shouldn't have special prosecutors"  https://abcnews.go.com/Politics http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6XuYt0V4AEx8bK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1127569249482887168/vid/320x180/LCyEk3ZjVJWNUntw.mp4?tag=12

One out of every three senior citizens in America relies on Social Security for virtually ALL of their income.

I don't think the wealthiest country in history should have seniors living in poverty. Trump wants to slash Social Security. I believe we must expand it.

RT @ThisWeekABC .@GStephanopoulos goes one-on-one with Sen. @RandPaul to discuss the Senate Intel Committee’s subpoena of Donald Trump Jr., and Pres. Trump’s tariffs on China and recent challenges with North Korea and Iran, Sunday on "This Week" https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/sunday-week-rep-adam-schiff-sen-rand-paul/story?id=62964715 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6U0nadXoAYExjB.jpg
Jane and I, our four kids and seven grandchildren, want to take this opportunity to wish all of the great mothers of our country a very happy Mother's Day.

On Mother's Day, it’s critical we discuss maternal mortality. Too many mothers of color die because they are left unheard at the doctor's office. Let's work towards a day where mothers of color are listened to and taken seriously. My Maternal CARE Act would do just that.

RT @TwitchyTeam ‘Irony much?’ Sen. Ted Cruz challenges Dems to replace ‘Biden’ with ‘Trump’ in POLITICO’s tweet https://twitchy.com/brettt-3136/2019/05/11/irony-much-sen-ted-cruz-challenges-dems-to-replace-biden-with-trump-in-politicos-tweet/

Everyone should be deeply troubled by the Vice President stating that the Trump administration wants to prevent our courts from issuing nationwide blocks to their abhorrent policies.
 
This is a blatant affront to our system of checks and balances and must be stopped.
Happy #MothersDay to all of the incredible moms out there, especially my mom, Oria, and my wonderful wife, Jeanette. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6Xbz0aWAAAPwEZ.jpg

Happy #MothersDay! Today, I’m honoring my mother. One morning after my daddy’s heart attack, I remember standing in their bedroom. Her face was red and puffy, with wadded-up tissues next to her. We’d just lost our family station wagon. Our house was next.
One of the most important ways we can support mothers is by making affordable childcare, equal pay, universal pre-K, and paid family leave a reality nationwide. #MothersDay

My mother didn’t have much, but she knew that her kids had a fighting chance to build a future. Today, not every family has that fighting chance. That’s what I’m fighting for to honor my mother, on Mother’s Day and every day. https://medium.com/@teamwarren/mothers-day-2a71c8419c01

Happy #MothersDay!

Let’s celebrate by making 3 months paid parental leave the minimum standard for all workers in the United States. 🌹

https://www.cnbc.com/2019/05/10/ocasio-cortez-latest-unusual-policy3-months-of-paid-parental-leave.html
I really hope @AnnRomney appreciates her Mother’s Day gift… http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6YrrmaX4AAyW49.jpg
My mother’s general philosophy was “speak the truth, be honest, and be clear of purpose.” I try to live by that every day.

A little over 1 year ago today. ⬇️ #KnockDowntheHouse https://twitter.com/knockdownmovie/status/1126532283047993344 QT @knockdownmovie Big dreams can have small beginnings. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1126302327374172160/img/B9tX73AVvRUNZJWe.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1126302327374172160/vid/320x320/qqLgD7DWOBmry9Ld.mp4?tag=12

I was raised by a mother who taught us that if you see a problem, you don't complain about it — you do something about it. That's why I'm running for president. We must stand up for our American values.
Feliz Día de la Madre a todas las increíbles madres. En especial a mi madre, Oria, y a mi esposa, Jeanette. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6XuWzOXsAE0Qv_.jpg

Big tech companies like Facebook have too much power over our economy, our society, and our democracy. And when they buy out their competition, they stifle innovation and face less pressure to protect our privacy. That's why we need to #BreakUpBigTech. https://medium.com/@teamwarren/heres-how-we-can-break-up-big-tech-9ad9e0da324c

“Many are the women of proven worth,but you have excelled them all.” 

Charm is deceptive & beauty fleeting;the woman who fears the LORD is to be praised. Acclaim her for the work of her hands & let her deeds praise her at the city gates.

Proverbs 31:29-31

Every day should be #MothersDay

But on #MothersDay2019 Jeanette & I thank all the moms whose care,love,encouragement & nurturing make our country & the world a better place

#HappyMothersDay2019

We’ve had over 70 town halls and we do a selfie line after each one. Not only is it fun, it’s when I get to listen to people’s stories. I’m so glad I got to take my 20,000th selfie yesterday with Umeirra in Cincinnati. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6VjvlYX4AULvT6.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1127415733766512640/vid/320x180/RH9Mk2HylP-AzBSo.mp4?tag=12

A mother’s role is one of the most important in our society. My mother, Lenore, taught me so many lessons about life, family, and faith. And @AnnRomney did the same for our boys. To all the mothers out there—happy #MothersDay! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6XnSQ0XoAE6MQh.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6XnSQ1XsAAor2z.jpg

For a long time, I thought that was just a story about my mother. And then years later, I came to understand that it's a story about millions of Americans who—no matter how scared they are—reach down, dig deep, find it, and pull up what they need to take care of the family.
To all the moms across Texas and America: thank you and we love you! #HappyMothersDay http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6Y6GppWAAU8dyQ.jpg

I watched her while she pulled it together, put that dress on, put on her high heels, blew her nose, walked to Sears, and got a minimum wage job. And that minimum wage job saved our house, but more importantly, it saved our family. That story is written on my heart.

I am incredibly lucky to spend #MothersDay with my mom this year. When she joined me on the campaign trail this weekend, it reminded me of the selflessness & commitment mothers in all capacities have for those they care for. Today, we want to let you know you are appreciated. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1127618953038180352/img/eM8DxF7At5peE6s6.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1127618953038180352/vid/320x320/ZjklvBWIkJkkgV6t.mp4?tag=12

For the first time ever, there are more than 100 women in the House – bringing an all new reason to celebrate this #MothersDay! https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2019/05/10/us/women-congress-mothers-day.html

Spread out on the bed was a black dress. It was that one dress that every mom had—it only came out for weddings, funerals, and graduations. She kept saying, “We will not lose this house. We will not lose this house.” She’d never worked outside the home, and she was terrified.

If you think your ‘celibacy’ is due to “female empowerment,” maybe it’s because far too many people relied on the disempowerment + silence of women to not be ‘celibate’ in the first place. https://twitter.com/theeconomist/status/1127634770131922944 QT @TheEconomist America is seeing a spike in celibacy fuelled by economics, technology and female empowerment https://www.economist.com/united-states/2019/05/04/no-sex-please-were-millennials?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=Economist_Films&utm_campaign=Link_Description&utm_term=Social_Issues&utm_content=Social_native_videos&linkId=100000006203862 http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1127634560781553664/img/6eZNPhMolOLi_iMT.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1127634560781553664/vid/320x320/x8ZSJILz8ntzdZoa.mp4?tag=12
